text: Nikhto ne ponese tyahar inshoho. Yakshcho obtyazhenyy i poklyche kohos聞, toy ne viz聞me nichoho, navit聞 yakshcho tse bude yoho rodych. Ty zasterihayesh lyshe tykh, khto potayemno boyit聞sya Hospoda svoho ta zvershuye molytvu. Khto ochystyvsya, toy ochystyvsya lyshe sam dlya sebe. I do Allaha povernennya
